title: Iranian protester Erfan Soltani released on bail, reports say
summary_full: Reports in January had said he was due to be executed after his arrest in connection with anti-government protests.
summary_public: Reports in January had said he was due to be executed after his arrest in connection with anti-government protests.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iranian protester Erfan Soltani released on bail, reports say
